article_title: Hostage killings leave Israeli protesters at 'breaking point'
sentence: Since  six  Israeli  hostages  were  found  dead  in  a  Gaza  tunnel  last  weekend,  the  weight  of  the  war  there  has  hung  heavier  on  Israel’s  leader.

sentence: “I  think  the  fact  that  they  were  alive  and  murdered  right  before  they  could  have  been  saved  –  that  broke  it,”  said  Anna  Rubin,  who  joined  a  protest  in  Tel  Aviv.
